3.caption_en:
A consumer-centric circular infographic with a central user icon labeled "Consumer," surrounded by a highlighted orange inner ring and an outer teal segmented ring labeling eight life domains (Living, Mobility, Health/Recreat., Work, Consumption, Education, Socialize, Entertainment); several black arrows point from the outer ring toward the inner ring and two pale-yellow wedge highlights appear in the concentric rings.

{
  "artifact_type": "diagram",
  "title": "Consumer-centric concentric ring diagram",
  "summary": "Circular infographic illustrating a central consumer surrounded by concentric rings and labeled life-domain segments with directional arrows.",
  "layers": 3,
  "center": {
    "type": "circle",
    "label": "Consumer",
    "icon": "user silhouette",
    "fill_color": "#43bfc4",
    "text_color": "#ffffff",
    "stroke_color": "#052a47",
    "position": "center"
  },
  "inner_ring": {
    "type": "annulus",
    "fill_color": "#f2b225",
    "stroke_color": "#052a47",
    "position": "around_center",
    "notes": "orange ring immediately surrounding center"
  },
  "outer_ring": {
    "type": "segmented_annulus",
    "segments_count": 8,
    "segment_labels_clockwise_from_top": [
      "Living",
      "Mobility",
      "Health / Recreat.",
      "Work",
      "Consumption",
      "Education",
      "Socialize",
      "Entertainment"
    ],
    "fill_color": "#3fb4b9",
    "label_color": "#ffffff",
    "stroke_color": "#ffffff",
    "position": "outermost"
  },
  "highlights": [
    {
      "type": "wedge",
      "location": "upper-left quadrant (between Living and Entertainment)",
      "fill_color": "#fde6a8",
      "opacity": 0.85,
      "notes": "pale yellow wedge spanning inner/outer rings"
    },
    {
      "type": "wedge",
      "location": "lower-right quadrant (Consumption/Work area)",
      "fill_color": "#fde6a8",
      "opacity": 0.85,
      "notes": "pale yellow wedge spanning inner/outer rings"
    }
  ],
  "arrows": {
    "count": 6,
    "style": "black thin shafts with triangular arrowheads",
    "direction": "pointing inward from outer ring toward inner orange ring/center",
    "approx_positions": [
      "upper-right (between Mobility and Health)",
      "right (between Health and Work)",
      "lower-right (near Consumption)",
      "lower-left (near Education)",
      "left (near Socialize)",
      "upper-left (near Entertainment)"
    ]
  },
  "grid_and_guides": {
    "concentric_guides": 3,
    "radial_guides": 8,
    "color": "#c8c8c8"
  },
  "colors": {
    "center": "#43bfc4",
    "inner_ring": "#f2b225",
    "outer_ring": "#3fb4b9",
    "highlight_wedge": "#fde6a8",
    "stroke_dark": "#052a47",
    "grid_lines": "#c8c8c8",
    "arrow_color": "#10121a",
    "label_color": "#ffffff"
  },
  "font": {
    "family": "sans-serif (bold)",
    "label_style": "all caps on outer ring, mixed case on center",
    "center_font_size_relative": 1.0,
    "outer_label_font_size_relative": 0.8
  },
  "notes": "Overall composition centers the consumer and maps eight life domains on an outer ring; visual emphasis placed on the inner orange ring and two pale-yellow wedges."
}

4.caption_en: A concentric, consumer-centric diagram showing a central "Consumer" hub surrounded by a middle ring and an outer category ring with labeled segments (Living, Mobility, Health/Recreat., Work, Consumption, Education, Socialize, Entertainment). Black arrows point from the middle ring toward the consumer, emphasizing connections between the consumer and each category.
4.caption_ru: A concentric, consumer-centric diagram showing a central "Consumer" hub surrounded by a middle ring and an outer category ring with labeled segments (Living, Mobility, Health/Recreat., Work, Consumption, Education, Socialize, Entertainment). Black arrows point from the middle ring toward the consumer, emphasizing connections between the consumer and each category.
